body_text:
I think instead of having flexible optional arguments you should make this just take a message, and then have another method that wraps it for the special case of locale and country.
Also, op isn't used anywhere.
body:
I think instead of having flexible optional arguments you should make this just take a message, and then have another method that wraps it for the special case of locale and country.

Also, `op` isn't used anywhere.

Also, op isn't used anywhere.
